info.name: BIMUZ API
info.description:
Complete API collection for BIMUZ project. Includes employee authentication, profile management, groups, and attendances.

**Base URL**: `{{base_url}}/api/v1/`

**Authentication**: JWT Bearer Token
- Access tokens expire after 1 hour
- Refresh tokens expire after 7 days
- Include token in header: `Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}`

**Roles**:
- dasturchi (Developer)
- direktor (Director)
- administrator (Administrator) - can manage Groups and Attendances
- sotuv_agenti (Sales Agent)
- mentor (Mentor) - can manage Attendances
- assistent (Assistant)

**Permissions**:
- Groups: Administrator only
- Attendances: Administrator or Mentor

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
Register a new employee account with user and employee profile.

**Required Fields:**
- email: Valid email address (unique)
- first_name: String, max 150 characters
- last_name: String, max 150 characters
- password: String (min 8 chars, strong validation)
- password_confirm: String (must match password)
- full_name: String, max 255 characters
- role: Choice from available roles

**Optional Fields:**
- professionality: String, max 255 characters (professional expertise or specialization)

**Optional Fields:**
- avatar: Image file (can be null)

**Response:**
- Returns employee profile and JWT tokens (access + refresh)
- Tokens are automatically saved to environment variables

Authenticate an employee and receive JWT tokens.

**Required Fields:**
- email: Employee's email address
- password: Employee's password

**Response:**
- Returns employee profile and JWT tokens (access + refresh)
- Tokens are automatically saved to environment variables

exec: console.log('✓ New tokens saved to environment');

request.description:
Obtain a new access token using a valid refresh token.

**Required Fields:**
- refresh: Valid refresh token

**Response:**
- Returns new access token (and new refresh token if rotation is enabled)
- New tokens are automatically saved to environment variables

item.name: Student Authentication

request.description:
Talaba ro'yxatdan o'tkazish va shartnoma PDF yaratish.

**Required Fields:**
- email: Valid email address (unique)
- password: String (min 8 chars, strong validation)
- password_confirm: String (must match password)
- full_name: String, max 255 characters
- phone: String, format '+999999999', max 13 digits, unique
- passport_serial_number: String, max 20 characters, unique
- birth_date: Date in format YYYY-MM-DD
- source: Choice from: 'instagram', 'facebook', 'telegram'

**Response:**
- Returns student profile, contract PDF URL, and JWT tokens (access + refresh)
- Contract PDF is automatically generated and saved
- Tokens are automatically saved to environment variables

Talabani autentifikatsiya qilish va JWT tokenlarni olish.

**Required Fields:**
- email: Student's email address
- password: Student's password

**Response:**
- Returns student profile and JWT tokens (access + refresh)
- Tokens are automatically saved to environment variables

item.description: Authentication endpoints for student registration and login. Contract PDF is automatically generated upon registration.

item.name: Student Profile

request.description:
Autentifikatsiya qilingan talabaning profil ma'lumotlarini olish.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)

**Response:**
- Returns complete student profile including:
  - Basic info (id, email, first_name, last_name, full_name)
  - Contact info (phone, passport_serial_number)
  - Birth date and source
  - Group assignment (if any)
  - Certificate and contract PDF URLs
  - Timestamps (created_at, updated_at)

Autentifikatsiya qilingan talabaning profilini yangilash (qisman yangilash mumkin).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)

**Allowed Fields for Update:**
- full_name: String, max 255 characters
- phone: String, format '+999999999', max 13 digits, unique
- certificate: File (upload via multipart/form-data)

**Note:** Email, passport_serial_number, birth_date, source cannot be updated after registration.

**Response:**
- Returns updated student profile

Shartnomani elektron imzo bilan tasdiqlash uchun SMS orqali yuborilgan kodni tekshirish.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)

**Request Body:**
- verification_code: String, exactly 6 digits (0-9)

**Success Response (200):**
- Returns student profile with contract_signed: true

**Error Responses:**
- 400: Invalid code, expired code, or contract already signed
- 401: Authentication required
- 404: Student profile not found

**Notes:**
- Code expires after 2 minutes (or configured time)
- Code is deleted after successful verification (one-time use)
- Contract can only be signed once

Shartnomani tasdiqlash uchun yangi kod yuborish.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)

**Request Body:** None (uses authenticated student's phone number)

**Success Response (200):**
- Returns confirmation message and expiration time

**Error Responses:**
- 400: Contract already signed
- 401: Authentication required
- 404: Student profile not found
- 500: SMS sending failed

**Notes:**
- New code invalidates previous code
- Code is sent via SMS to student's phone number
- For test accounts, code may also be included in API response

item.name: Employee Management

request.description:
List all employees (Developer or Administrator only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Developer or Administrator role

**Query Parameters (optional):**
- page: Page number for pagination (default: 1)
- page_size: Number of results per page (default: 20)

**Response:**
- Returns list of employees with role, status, and profile information

Retrieve a specific employee by ID (Developer or Administrator only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Developer or Administrator role

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Employee ID (integer)

**Response:**
- Returns complete employee data including role, status, and profile

Update a specific employee (Developer or Administrator only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Developer or Administrator role

**Important:**
- Administrator CANNOT update Director or Developer roles
- Developer has FULL access (can update all roles)
- Administrator can only update lower roles

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Employee ID (integer)

**Updatable Fields:**
- role: Choice from available roles (restricted for Administrator)
- is_active: Boolean (user account status)
- full_name: String, max 255 characters
- professionality: String, max 255 characters (professional expertise or specialization, optional)
- avatar: Image file (use multipart/form-data for file upload)

**Validation:**
- Administrator cannot assign Director or Developer roles
- Administrator cannot update employees with Director or Developer roles

item.description: Employee management endpoints for Developers and Administrators. Requires authentication and appropriate role permissions.

item.name: Groups

request.description:
Retrieve a list of all groups (Administrator only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator role only

**Query Parameters (optional):**
- page: Page number for pagination (default: 1)
- page_size: Number of results per page (default: 20)

**Response:**
- Returns list of groups with computed fields (current_students_count, available_seats, is_planned, is_active)

Create a new group (Administrator only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator role only

**Required Fields:**
- professionality: String (professional expertise or specialization)
- dates: Choice ('mon_wed_fri' or 'tue_thu_sat')
- time: Time in HH:MM:SS format (e.g., "14:00:00")
- seats: Positive integer (maximum number of students)

**Optional Fields:**
- starting_date: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (for planned groups)
- mentor: ID of employee with Mentor role

**Validation:**
- Mentor must have 'mentor' role
- Professionality_id must be a valid choice
- Dates must be a valid choice
- Seats must be a positive integer

Retrieve a specific group by ID (Administrator only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator role only

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Group ID (integer)

**Response:**
- Returns complete group data with computed fields

Update a specific group (partial update) (Administrator only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator role only

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Group ID (integer)

**Updatable Fields:**
- professionality: String (professional expertise or specialization)
- dates: Choice from available dates
- time: Time in HH:MM:SS format
- starting_date: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format
- seats: Positive integer
- mentor: ID of employee with Mentor role

Delete a specific group by ID (Administrator only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator role only

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Group ID (integer)

**Response:**
- Returns 204 No Content on success

item.description: Group management endpoints. Requires Administrator role.

item.name: Attendances

request.description:
Retrieve a list of all attendances (Administrator or Mentor only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator or Mentor role

**Query Parameters (optional):**
- page: Page number for pagination (default: 1)
- page_size: Number of results per page (default: 20)

**Response:**
- Returns list of attendances with participant details

Create a new attendance record (Administrator or Mentor only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator or Mentor role

**Required Fields:**
- group: ID of the group
- date: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format

**Optional Fields:**
- mentor: ID of employee with Mentor role
- participants: Array of student IDs (must be members of the group)

**Validation:**
- Mentor must have 'mentor' role
- All participants must be members of the selected group
- Unique constraint: one attendance per group per date

Retrieve a specific attendance by ID (Administrator or Mentor only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator or Mentor role

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Attendance ID (integer)

**Response:**
- Returns complete attendance data with participant details

Update a specific attendance (partial update) (Administrator or Mentor only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator or Mentor role

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Attendance ID (integer)

**Updatable Fields:**
- group: ID of the group
- date: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format
- mentor: ID of employee with Mentor role
- participants: Array of student IDs (must be members of the group)

Delete a specific attendance by ID (Administrator or Mentor only).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)
**Permission:** Administrator or Mentor role

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Attendance ID (integer)

**Response:**
- Returns 204 No Content on success

item.name: Student Booking
item.description: Student booking endpoints for online group booking. No authentication required.

request.description:
List all groups with booking information including availability.

**Authentication:** Not required

**Response Fields:**
- can_accept_bookings: Boolean indicating if group can accept new bookings
- days_since_start: Number of days since group started (null if not started)
- available_seats: Number of available seats in the group

**10-Day Rule:**
- If group hasn't started (planned): booking allowed
- If group has started: booking allowed only if < 10 days have passed
- If group started >= 10 days ago: booking not allowed

Book a student into a group with validation.

**Authentication:** Not required

**Request Body:**
- student_id: ID of the student to book (integer, required)
- group_id: ID of the group to book into (integer, required)

**Validation Rules:**
- Student must exist and not already be booked in another group
- Group must have available seats
- Group must be able to accept bookings (10-day rule)

**10-Day Rule:**
- If group hasn't started (planned): booking allowed
- If group has started: booking allowed only if < 10 days have passed
- If group started >= 10 days ago: booking not allowed (alternatives suggested)

**Error Responses:**
- 400: No available seats (alternatives suggested)
- 400: 10-day limit exceeded (alternatives suggested)
- 400: Student already booked
- 404: Student or Group not found

Cancel a student's booking by removing them from their group.

**Authentication:** Not required

**Request Body:**
- student_id: ID of the student whose booking to cancel (integer, required)

**Response:**
- Returns cancelled booking information

**Error Responses:**
- 400: Student has no active booking
- 404: Student not found

List all invoices. Students can see only their own invoices. Staff/admin can see all invoices.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)

**Response:**
- Returns list of invoices with full details
- Students see only their own invoices
- Staff/admin see all invoices

**Error Responses:**
- 401: Invalid or missing authentication token
- 403: User does not have permission to view invoices

Get detailed information about a specific invoice.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)

**URL Parameters:**
- invoice_id: Invoice ID (integer, required)

**Response:**
- Returns full invoice details including payment status, Multicard UUID, checkout URL, etc.

**Error Responses:**
- 401: Invalid or missing authentication token
- 403: User does not have permission to view this invoice
- 404: Invoice not found

Create a payment link for an invoice via Multicard payment gateway.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)

**Request Body:**
- invoice_id: ID of the invoice to pay (integer, required)
- lang: Payment page language. Options: "ru", "uz", "en". Default: "uz" (optional)
- return_url: URL to redirect after successful payment (optional)
- return_error_url: URL to redirect after payment error (optional)
- send_sms: Send invoice link via SMS to student. Default: false (optional)

**Response:**
- Returns checkout_url, short_link, deeplink, and uuid for payment

**Error Responses:**
- 400: Invoice is already paid, cancelled, or failed to create payment link
- 401: Invalid or missing authentication token
- 403: User does not have permission to pay this invoice
- 404: Invoice not found
- 500: Server error during payment link creation

Check the current payment status of an invoice from Multicard.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer Token)

**Query Parameters:**
- invoice_id: Invoice ID to check (integer, required)

**Response:**
- Returns current invoice status, Multicard status, checkout URL, receipt URL, and payment time

**Error Responses:**
- 400: invoice_id parameter is required or failed to get status
- 401: Invalid or missing authentication token
- 403: User does not have permission to view this invoice
- 404: Invoice not found
